headline: Gilead (GILD) Downplays FDA Decision to Pause HIV Combination Trial over Safety Concern
summary: Gilead Sciences Inc. (NASDAQ:GILD) is one of the 12 best healthcare stocks to buy now. Nevertheless, the company suffered a significant setback after the US Food and Drug Administration put on hold studies of several of its HIV drugs on June 11. The FDA placed a hold on the HIV treatment trial of GS-1720 and […]
